name: Attack
note: Skill #1 corresponds to the Attack command.

name: Guard
note: Skill #2 corresponds to the Guard command.

description:
Below are spaces for when you would like to display
things above skills when you open the menu.
name: -----Reserved
Attack
note: An attack that ignores some enemy defense.

description: \I[76]\I[92] Performs a series of attacks on an enemy.
name: Dual Attack

description: \I[76]\I[93] Performs an attack on 2 random enemies.
name: Double Attack

description: \I[82]\I[93] Flee from battle.

note:

motion evade: user
move user: targets, front, 25
wait for movement
motion thrust: user
wait: 25
action animation
wait: 10
shake screen: 3, 9, 5
action effect
death break
</target Action>

<Custom Action Sequence>
<JS Skill Enable>
if (user != $gameTroop.members()[0] )
 {  enabled = true;  }
 else
 { enabled = false; };
</JS Skill Enable>

description: \I[68]\I[93] Inflicts Stone-type damage on all enemies.

name: Avalanche

description: \I[9]\I[92] A loud roar that freezes up to four enemies in fear.
name: Petrifying Scream
note:
<Custom Action Sequence>
<JS Targets>
  targets = targets.filter((value, index, arr) => arr.indexOf(value) === index);
</JS Targets>

description: \I[2]\I[92] Stabs an enemy and inflicts Poison state.
name: Gouge

description: \I[9]\I[92] Attacks an enemy and slows them down.
name: Minute Hand

description: Fix a Clockwork ally if one is knocked out.
name: Clockmaking
note:
<Enable Switch: 65>
<Custom Action Sequence>
<JS Targets>
var newTargets = [];

for ( const deadGuy of $gameTroop.deadMembers() ) {
  if (deadGuy.enemyId() == 244 ||
      deadGuy.enemyId() == 105 ||
      deadGuy.enemyId() == 184  ) { 
    newTargets.push(deadGuy); 
  };
};

console.log("New targets");
console.log(newTargets);
targets = newTargets;
</JS Targets>

description: Slow all enemies and speed up all allies.
name: Tempo Shift

description: Fix a Clockwork ally if one is knocked out.
name: Clockmaking
note:
<Enable Switch: 66>
<Custom Action Sequence>
<JS Targets>
var newTargets = [];

for ( const deadGuy of $gameParty.deadMembers() ) {
  if (deadGuy._actorId == 244 ||
      deadGuy._actorId == 105 ||
      deadGuy._actorId == 184  ) { 
    newTargets.push(deadGuy); 
  };
};

console.log("New targets");
console.log(newTargets);
targets = newTargets;
</JS Targets>
